summary: When Atlantian troops assault Metropolis as revenge for the death of their king, the Queen seeks help from the Justice League to find her son who has gone missing during the madness.
cast: Sean Astin|Rosario Dawson|Nathan Fillion|Christopher Gorham|Matt Lanter|Sumalee Montano|Shemar Moore|Jerry O'Connell|Jason O'Mara|Sam Witwer|Melique Berger|Steve Blum|Patrick Cavanaugh|Larry Cedar|Barry Dennen|Paul Eiding|Sirena Irwin|Jay Johnson|Matthew Yang King|Juliet Landau|Harry Lennix|George Newbern|Khary Payton|Dane Jamieson|Andrea Romano|Michael Rosenbaum|Cedric Yarbrough
keywords: justice league|atlantis|based on comic book|dc comics|superhero team
title: La liga de la justicia: El trono de Atlantis
